author: friccita
body:
I have modified two macros for making tracker material budget validation plots.

MaterialBudget.C
- now saves plots into root files as well, located in Images/

TrackerMaterialBudgetComparison.C
- now saves plots into root files as well, located in Images/
- plots the difference between MB histograms (new-old), as well as the ratio (new/old)
- compares new vs. old x0 MB histograms for the 8 material categories, checks bin-by-bin whether or not the histograms are identical (1 if yes, 0 if no), and outputs the result to a text file in the Images/ folder for MB plots
title: MB validation macros modified to save plots to root files
